from paddleocr import PaddleOCR
from pathlib import Path

print(''Initializing PaddleOCR...'')
ocr = PaddleOCR(lang=''en'')

# Test on one castle cutout
print(''\nTesting on castle_001 (should be 3):'')
result = ocr.ocr(''castle_cutouts/castle_001_1098_1198.png'')

if result and result[0]:
    for line in result[0]:
        bbox, (text, confidence) = line
        print(f''  Text: [{text}], Confidence: {confidence:.2f}'')
else:
    print(''  No text detected'')

# Test on one castle cutout

Bash("C:\Users\mail\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\python.exe" -c "
from paddleocr import PaddleOCR
print(''PaddleOCR import successful!'')

ocr = PaddleOCR(lang=''en'')
result = ocr.ocr(''castle_cutouts/castle_001_1098_1198.png'')

if result and len(result) > 0:
    page_result = result[0]
    rec_texts = page_result.get(''rec_texts'', [])
    print(f''Detected {len(rec_texts)} text regions:'')
    for i, text in enumerate(rec_texts):
        print(f''  {i+1}. [{text}]'')
else:
    print(''No text detected'')
" 2)
